content: And it came to pass in the twelfth year, in the twelfth  on the first  of the month,  the word of the  came to me, saying,
“Son of man, take up a lamentation for Pharaoh king of Egypt, and say to him:
‘I will also trouble the hearts of many peoples, when I bring your destruction among the nations, into the countries which you have not known.

Yes, I will make many peoples astonished at you, and their kings shall be horribly afraid of you when I brandish My sword before them; and they shall tremble  moment, every man for his own life, in the day of your fall.
‘For thus says the Lord : “The sword of the king of Babylon shall come upon you.
By the swords of the mighty warriors, all of them the most terrible of the nations, I will cause your multitude to fall.
Egypt and Others Consigned to the Pit
It came to pass also in the twelfth year, on the fifteenth  of the month,  the word of the  came to me, saying:
